tips.save: The organizational business will be transferred to the merged organization, and the original organization will not be deactivated after the merger.
tips.stop: The organizational business will be transferred to the merged organization, and the original organization will be discontinued after the merger.
tips.targetView: The business of the pre merger organization will be transferred to the post merger organization
tips.drag: Drag the organization card to set whether to deactivate or not to deactivate the organization before merging
move.stop: Move to the pre merge organization (deactivated) area
move.save: Move to the pre merger organization (not deactivated) area
